page.title: 16A TYPICAL DAY OF C.CARLING
page.content: On friday morning it is such a relief to have the school week nearly over. My alarm goes off at 7:30 AM.I drag myself out of bed and get dressed.I lose my tie every morning,but it is found after a thorough search. Then I get washed and hobble downstairs feeling awful.The paper is posted through the letter box and is waiting for me.I read the paper.At 7:55 AM. I have my breakfast and then I clean my teeth.We set off for school and get there at 8:50 AM.After registration we have French.After French it is geography.Next its P.E. then maths but that drags on a bit then music and rural science at 4:10 I get home and do any homework that I have been given.At 9:30 PM.I go to bed after being outside to play. {
